home.aboutText1: AI SANA Program is an initiative of the Ministry of Science and Higher Education to introduce advanced artificial intelligence technologies into education.
home.aboutText2: Covers 100,000 students, stimulates the creation of DeepTech startups, development of AI competencies and technological entrepreneurship.
home.aboutText3: Takes place in 3 stages: mass training (650k students), studying ML and AI business, acceleration of 1.5k startups with support from experts from Stanford, Imperial and King's College.
